name: sitting at a bar in the corner of the whirlpool galaxy
name_original: sitting at a bar in the corner of the whirlpool galaxy
description:
"the bar's dark, cold, and basically empty. some mercenary's asleep (or dead) at a booth in the back. you can't really tell -- the merc's face is preoccupied by a plate full of mashed potatoes and gravy."

a short interactive conversation between two random original characters in an attempt to remind myself how to write.
